website_summaries.verdict: A feature-packed, well-made, and intuitive waterproof camera that is the updated version of a trusted favorite. A worthy investment for anyone who wants to take superior under-water images.
pros: Updated model that delivers more processing power than the Hero5
Has a durable build and numerous features that are easy to master
Feature set includes Bluetooth, voice recognition, and WiFi
cons: Pricey, but it's also one of the most popular and reliable waterproof cameras on the market today

website_summaries.verdict: As the latest upgrade, the HERO6 had big shoes to fill, but thanks to new modes and resolutions, we believe it does.
pros: Slo-mo settings have been improved exponentially
The Hero 6 Black can shoot 4K/60 and 1080p/240 slow motion
cons: Expensive, and perhaps a bit too much camera for hobbyists
Some have found the new settings difficult to use

website_summaries.verdict: The older HERO6 still has a lot going for it, including multiple recording modes and an improved touchscreen. A solid option if you need a reliable, affordable action camera.
pros: With new linear mode, you can remove all distortion
That, combined with additional resolutions, lets this camera produce the highest quality content
cons: Some hobbyist photographers don't find the new additions necessary and find the GoPro harder to use

website_summaries.verdict: GoPro one ups its own top camera with the Hero6 Black and its superior stabilization and performance in the same small waterproof package as its predecessor.
pros: The GoPro Hero6 Black has groundbreaking electronic video stabilization for the category, a long list of resolutions and frame rates to choose from and overall improved image quality
Its faster Wi-Fi makes mobile transfers a little less painful
cons: It's pricey at $500, £500 or AU$750 and all those extra features and faster performance don't do battery life any favors

customer_reviews.text: I've owned the Hero, Hero 3+ Black and now the Hero 6 Black. The improvements in the 6 are amazing from the 3. Picture quality is amazing as expected and the features are so cool. The touch screen works great and I love the Video Time Lapse feature. I compared my friends 7 to the 6 and, for me, the slight improvements in the 7 did not warrant the big difference in price. Unless you need the hyper stability the 7 offers (which is amazing), I recommend you get the 6.
customer_reviews.author: The Undietaker

customer_reviews.title: Fast, smart, the best!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing technology! I feel less alone with this new GoPro 6! I talk to, she listens to me: "GoPro turn off!", "GoPro take a photo!" It's fantastic! I upgraded from GoPro Hero 3 so the difference is huge! Amazing quality pictures and videos, fast responding camera, it turns on, off, starts recording instantly. There is no need to touch the camera, not even to turn it on or off. There is no doubt this will be my all around camera. It will be with me at any time, anywhere. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Love it but the battery life is short and GET THE RIGHT MEMORY CARD!
customer_reviews.text: I'm torn. This bad boy was expensive. The quality is not DSLR (though I expected that). It is still pretty great looking. Low lighting conditions aren't fantastic but it still is better than most would do. The battery life sucks, even with the ONE recommended memory card (make sure to check and get the right one, don't' use samsung evo). I bought a third party extended battery to get closer to 4 hours instead of just over 1 hour. I make a couple videos a week on my YT synsurvival. Overall, I would recommend. I should have probably waited until the price came down though.
customer_reviews.author: Syntria

customer_reviews.title: Constant problems with multiple units. Absolute trash.
customer_reviews.text: The GoPro Hero 6 Black comes loaded with very poorly designed firmware. Our studio bought 5 of these, and none of them are able to stay connected to any device long enough to update the firmware. They turn off in the middle of recording, they stop recording unexpectedly and they disconnect from the hardware remote constantly. I have never used a less reliable recording device in my life. Run away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first GoPro and I’m loving it. Super tiny and cool camera. I’m glad I didn’t purchase a generic action camera (usually sold as a fraction of the cost), and jumped straight to this one! The cellphone app makes even easier reviewing, downloading and editing your files (cheap action cameras don’t have that!). What a like the most is the voice control... it is just awesome turning on, off, changing modes, start shooting videos or photo without having to touch the camera!
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Get lots of extra batterys
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip to Hawaii and it didn't disappoint. It worked great and we have fantastic videos from our trip! The only downside is battery life, if you just figure 1 battery for every hour of video you will be safe. I purchased 4 extra battery's (after market. Worked great.) besides the one it came with and wish I would have purchased at least 6 with all the snorkeling we did. At 5 battery's we would snorkel for 3 or 4 hours and go for a hike and the battery's were done by lunch. only down side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable to the point of being unusable
customer_reviews.text: First, it took 2 cameras before one worked. The first one had a latch that could not be opened, the 2nd one had a half frozen video picture. The 3rd one worked fine for a year. Firmware up to date, proper SD card in. Video ran 10 seconds, then the picture froze and recorded an hour worth of sound with a frozen frame. Never Again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Randomly stops recording timelapses after a few hours to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Randomly stops recording timelapses after a few hours to a couple days, and when using direct to video format it turns back on with the message "repairing file." I have tried 3 different SD cards and update the firmware. Also, you can't use night lapse mode directly to video. And it also incessantly whines at you to upgrade firmware when using the GoPro app.
customer_reviews.author: Elaskanator

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with the GoPro Hero 6
customer_reviews.text: I've had numerous GoPros and this is the first one I'm really disappointed with. I took it out on a trip to film some footage of a national park and when I was recording at 4K 60fps, a lot of the times, it would stop recording within 10 seconds. When I came back from the trip to look at the footage, I noticed a lot of video glitches. I'm just past the 30-day return now, so unfortunately, I'm stuck with this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Behrends

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This blew every expectation I had out of the water. Outstanding 1080 and 4K pictures and video, above and below water. No more silly clear plastic case. Simple rubberized exterior which helps with gripping it. Super great feature the pic's and video will export directly to the app without issue, unlike the GoPro 4 Black that I used to use. Easy to use touch screen with zoom. I took one star off of battery life because the battery doesn't very long. but given the small size what else could I expect. I don't know how GoPro could possibly make a better product, but if they ever did I would buy it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: So much yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this GoPro for my New Zealand/Australia trip and couldn’t be happier! The quality is phenomenal! I used it on an ATV safari and it’s so clean, we hit tons of bumps and ditches and you wouldn’t even know. It held up amazingly in the Great Barrier Reef (with a waterproof case) and was great with our time lapse videos. We did buy an extra battery because we were gone for three weeks (along with an extra memory chip). It does take some getting used to, especially when taking out the memory chip or battery, we have to use a spoon to pry it open. Otherwise, I am now a GoPro fan!
customer_reviews.author: Kellier56

customer_reviews.title: Better than Hero5
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to video running races and obstacle courses. The new stability is over the top quality and reason to buy the 6 vs 5. Had to buy a case for the camera to keep mud and dust out but otherwise no complaints. Sound quality amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: R M

customer_reviews.title: Naaa, dont buy this one, this gopro 6 is not good.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the gopro I have had, this is the worst. The recording stops for no reason, the screen freezes, you have to take out the battery to react. in general I have not had a good experience with this gopro 6. My old gopro silver edition 4 is much better, more reliable. Bad camera would not buy it again and I do not recommend it, I am a mountaineer, mountain biker, and when you lose a great shot because the camera was paralyzed without reason, you realize that you lost a great moment for the recovery because of a mediocre camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Tamayo S,

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. This is a huge upgrade from my ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. This is a huge upgrade from my gopro 4 to the 6. I snowboard and its always hassle to touch the power button to record and turn off the recording. There is a feature where it is voice activated to instantly record your footage without touching any buttons. Note: Always make sure that you have the right supported SD card. Make sure the card can record in 4K. Don't cheap out on the SD card you will see issues like: gopro freezing, video won't play back, basically anything that is recorded sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Thien Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Nice improvements, feels more refined than previous versions.
customer_reviews.text: Nice upgrades! The linear mode has fixed what I've always considered to be the fatal flaw in GoPro's HERO line. I'm not sure I'm a 100% fan of the swiping on the interface, but I suppose that's what you get when you pack a camera like this with features! Also great that the whole body is waterproof now, that's a major boon for reducing the bulk of your mounting solutions. Also, footage looks great :-)
customer_reviews.author: AR Creative

customer_reviews.title: Action Cam v6
customer_reviews.text: Considering a second one and as well as the Backbone mods for my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Hungry Camerman

customer_reviews.title: Good Luck Finding an SD Card
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this, I made three attempts (including the card I bought with the camera) to get a compatible SD card, and was sent the wrong card each time. The cards I received were all 'upgrades' of the compatible card. I supposed the compatible cards are no longer made (?). The camera locks up on the 'upgrade' cards. Returned the camera and the cards.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but has some serious freaking problems problems
customer_reviews.text: It can record and such high video quality that my phones and tablets can't play it. But I have some really awesome video of my kiteboarding sessions. It will go back into service mode. For no reason. I'll pull an awesome jump, look up and see that it had to be set up again. Which is not easy in waves, kite over head, wind and current pulling you around. And trying to keep track of my board.
customer_reviews.author: Only1willow

customer_reviews.title: Dishonesty
customer_reviews.text: Noticed that this camera doesn’t come with a memory card .they will promise to send you one when you will submit 5 stars review. If you don’t do it you have to get it on your own. So 5 stars reviews are not for the camera but for a gift that cost $12 If a product is good it will sell , when I read reviews I want a honest answer .
customer_reviews.author: beaTobol
